alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:08PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Eastern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... South central McNairy County in western Tennessee... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 608 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Canaan, or 12 miles north of Ripley, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Corinth, Ripley, Blue Mountain, Glen, Theo, Gravestown, Farmington, Walnut, Falkner, Guys, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Murry, Brody, Strickland, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Jobes and Whitten Town. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and western Tennessee.
